snippet: A man killed one person in a Casper neighborhood before going to a nearby community college on Friday morning and killing a faculty member and then himself, the police said.
abstract: Man in Casper, Wyoming, kills one person before going to nearby community college and killing a faculty member and then himself.
lead_paragraph: A man killed one person in a Casper neighborhood before going to a nearby community college on Friday morning and killing a faculty member and then himself, the police said.

headline.seo: Man Kills Two and Then Himself in Wyoming
headline.main: Wyoming: Man Kills Two and Then Himself
headline.print_headline: Wyoming: Man Kills Two and Then Himself
